item.title: Singtel hosts launch event for iPhone 6s and 6s Plus
item.description: Singtel began offering the iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus to customers this morning. Eager customers with confirmed appointments started lining up as early as 4:45 am, hoping to be among the first in Singapore to get their hands on the new devices. Over 40,000 customers expressed interest in the new iPhones, and all 12,000 launch appointment slots were booked. The iPhone 6s Plus and the rose gold models were particularly popular, selling out in less than three minutes.

item.title: Starting from 26 September, StarHub is excited to welcome buyers of the iPhone 6s and 6s Plus
item.description: Source: StarHub. Customers waiting in line inside the newly renovated StarHub Shop in VivoCity, one of 38 StarHub stores serving pre-order customers on September 25th. On September 25th, pre-orders for Apple’s iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus became available for pickup at 38 StarHub stores across Singapore. To ensure a smooth pickup process, customers who pre-ordered were given specific locations and time slots when they booked their appointments. Starting September 26th, customers can visit any StarHub Shop or participating authorized retailers to purchase the phones directly.
